about_the_game:
"Princess of Destruction | 滅ぼし姫" is a small yet deep Roguelike RPG.

Compact and intense

This game can be cleared by simply taking 100 steps and defeating the final boss. You can enjoy short but rewarding battles and powerful growth.

This is a traditional RPG which the main character grows stronger by leveling up and purchasing equipment, but it has been streamlined by removing unnecessary elements to focus on delivering a unique depth.

As you level up, you learn skills and abilities randomly.

There are 10 skills in total, and their effects can be dramatic depending on how you use them.

There are also 10 abilities (passive effects), and your strategy will change significantly depending on which ones you set.

Roguelike RPG

This game has the following properties:

-Randomness

The randomly acquired skills and abilities, combined with various situational changes, allow you to enjoy the game repeatedly.

-Permadeath

If you lose, you lose everything, but by learning and improving, you can achieve better results.

Fast-paced story

The story moves smoothly. There are no branches.

The story is set in a world on the brink of destruction due to the appearance of overwhelmingly powerful monsters. Humanity formed an organization called the "Counter's Guild" to fight against its destruction.

The main character is Ayame, a girl who joined the guild with her own purpose.

She carries the fates of many people on her shoulders, but when she encounters an unexpected individual, she begins to question her role.

What will become of her?

No Wait

This game minimizes instances where you cannot control the gameplay during battles, story sequences, and so on, allowing for a smooth and enjoyable experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains some of the following expressions

* Cartoon violence / Fantasy Violence
* Fights without gore or blood; display of weapons; derogatory language; anguish
* Blood; violent acts; bodily injury; corpses; violence description
* Killing
* Contains extremely violent or gory content; (example: mutilation; torture; detailed deaths)
* Glamorization of/incitement to violence
* Favorable depiction of criminal behavior
* Fear - Settings are bleak and dark, but not realistic
* Mild profanity, swearing, cursing
* Violence or Gore
